duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional customer service by taking orders, assembling orders, and delivering food to customers.
Communicate with customers in a friendly and professional manner, ensuring a positive customer experience.
Maintain cleanliness of the dining room, including cleaning tables and floors.
Process payments efficiently and handle cash transactions following proper procedures.
Follow food safety and handling procedures to ensure the safety of customers and staff.
Ability to show up to scheduled shifts on time and work under pressure at a fast pace.
Work as a team member to assist in completion of tasks and assignments.
Take initiative and comply with company policies to uphold customer service standards.
Provide quick and friendly service to all customers, showing responsibility and dependability.
Take pride in delivering excellent service and taking on entry-level responsibilities.
